page.title: 13LEISURE ACTIVITIES: ADULTS.
page.content: A questionaire was sent out to find out how leisure time was spent.We discovered that the most popular activity is{watching T.V.}with between 1 & 80 hrs. per week spent doing this. {Reading}(on average 5hrs. per week), {gardening}(10hrs.) & walking (6hrs.) were the next most popular. There are many local footpaths through attractive countryside.{D.I.Y.}(for males){knitting & sewing}(for females) &{church activities}came next.{Sports activities include water & ball sports running,keep_fit,darts & horse _riding Sports clubs & evening classes (High Wycombe,Marlow & Maidenhead) are reached by car. {Chauffering children}to their social activities is also mentioned as a leisure time pursuit.More unusual activities include family history, puppetry, & computers.
